title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram with South Sea Pearls - NEC03006
features: Exquisite Haaram featuring a classic South Indian design with a delicate fusion of traditional and contemporary elements. The necklace showcases meticulously set diamonds forming intricate floral and paisley motifs. Two stunning pear-shaped Emeralds are the focal points of the pendant. Dangling South Sea pearls add a touch of elegance and movement. The piece exhibits the fine craftsmanship synonymous with Hyderabad jewelry making.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and cultural events.
description: This grand Haaram represents a timeless blend of traditional South Indian artistry and modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, rubies, and South Sea pearls, combined with impeccable Hyderabadi craftsmanship, makes this a valuable heirloom piece. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and contemporary attire, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
